thread.title: Man, 28, dies after being found critically hurt at North End home
thread.title_full: Man, 28, dies after being found critically hurt at North End home

author: cbc
title: Man, 28, dies after being found critically hurt at North End home
text:
Winnipeg's homicide unit is investigating after a 28-year-old man was found with "multiple serious injuries" at a North End home and died in hospital.
Police were called to a duplex in the 500 block of Magnus Avenue, between Powers Street and Andrews Street, around 11:15 p.m. Monday.
The man was found in critical condition "suffering from multiple serious injuries" and rushed to hospital, police said. He later died from the injuries.
The police identification unit is on scene on Magnus Avenue. (Trevor Brine/CBC)
Numerous people are in police custody for questioning, police said.
Part of Magnus, which runs alongside William Whyte elementary school, remained blocked off early Monday. The identification unit is also on the scene.
Anyone with information about the incident is asked to contact investigators at 204-986-6508 or Crime Stoppers at 204-786-TIPS (8477).
A man was found critically injured in this duplex and later died from his injuries, police say. (Trevor Brine/CBC)
